text: Niscaya yisakale kupharai karaiche sihamte allahara pathara paraa lagate machajide haraamara paraa manuhaka badha diye, yaâ€™ta ami sthaniya arau bahiraagata sakalo manuhara babe'i sama adhikara dana karaicho, tata yiye an'yayabharae ilahada tatha dbinabiraodhi papa karmara iccha karae, ami taka yantranadayaka sasti bhoga karaama
